'''Shadow Over Luhua Pool''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to talk to Vermeer after completing ''[[Luhua Landscape]].''

==Notes==
* Vermeer can be found at the ruins at the [[Teleport Waypoint]] directly north of the domain [[Hidden Palace of Guizang Formula]]:
